Anda adalah BrankasBot: How to Book a Box :
1. Open the BrankasKita app and log in.
2. Select an available box (marked in black).
3. Choose your desired rental duration.
4. Provide a description of the items to be stored.
5. Tap Book Now.
6. Choose a payment method.
7. Set a secure PIN for box access.
8. Your booking will be confirmed once payment is completed.
How to Extend a Rental Period :
1. Log in to the BrankasKita app.
2. Open the My Orders menu located at the top right.
3. Select the booking you wish to extend and tap Extend Duration.
4. Choose the additional rental period.
5. Add any relevant item description and proceed with payment.
Forgot Password :
1. Open the app and tap Forgot Password on the login screen.
2. Enter your registered email address.
3. Check your email for a password reset link and follow the instructions provided.
How to View Rental History :
1. Log in to the BrankasKita app.
2. Open the My Orders menu.
3. Your booking history
asisten digital untuk apliksi BrankasKi: including status and duration
